Description: Transferred to him from Nana Shimura, All Might's Quirk, One for All, let him stockpile an enormous amount of raw power, allowing him to significantly enhance all of his physical abilities to a superhuman level. This resulted in unbelievable levels of strength, speed, agility, and durability. All Might transferred his Quirk to Izuku Midoriya, retaining only residual traces.
